sentences.en: An ancient pagoda frowns on the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 一座古塔阴森森地矗立在山腰上.

sentences.en: From every mountainside, let freedom ring.
sentences.cn: 让每一处山坡都响彻自由的回声吧!

sentences.en: Great rocks rolled down the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 巨大的岩石顺着山坡滚落下来。

sentences.en: Our battalion would lie in ambush on the mountainside.
Pieces of rock plummeted down the mountainside to the ground below.
sentences.cn: 岩石一块块顺着山的陡坡滚落到地面.

sentences.en: She watched the magnificent waterfall cascade down the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 她看着壮观的瀑布从山坡上倾泻而下.

sentences.en: Snow scattered unequally over the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 雪不均匀地散落在山腰上.

sentences.en: The couple trudged up the dark mountainside.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇在黑黝黝的山坡上艰难跋涉。

sentences.en: The great rocks rolled down the mountainside.
The highway twists up on the mountainside.
The path twists up on the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 这条山路在山腰盘旋而上.

sentences.en: The trail twists up on the mountainside.
They walked a quarter of a mile down the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 他们沿山坡下行了四分之一英里的路程.
小径沿着山坡向上延伸。

sentences.en: We left the road, and again bumped over the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 我们驶离公路，再次在山腰上颠簸前行。

sentences.en: Woodmen trod a path on the mountainside.
sentences.cn: 伐木工人在山腰上踩出了一条小路.
